name: Space Crystal
overview: An exciting adventure game with animated 3D graphics. Travel through space in search of an Illudium Crystal. Trade minerals and fuel on the Planets you encounter in your travels. If you are skillful enough in your trading to acquire the Crystal, you must return to save your Planets from destruction. Beware of Black Holes, watch out for hostile Aliens and try to pass undamaged through Meteorite Storms. You may be fortunate and find abandoned alien Space Craft with minerals and fuel for the taking, but be warned of the Space Pirates who will attempt to rob you.
